attributes.title: worst APP EVER!!!!
attributes.review: do not download this app, after downloading it, it hacked into my phone and got all of my information then, my house exploded and the only way to fix it was that i had to vote for this white supremacist!

this is the worst app on the market. this app took several days to download where as most apps on my phone take seconds. this app completely ate my battery and made my phone so insanely slow. i hate this app and would be so happy if it got taken out of the app store. it makes my phone crash every time i open it. i absolutely hate it... i wish i could rate 0 stars...

attributes.title: Horrible    😤
attributes.review: This app is horrible it took wipe my data off my phone and then I kept getting this calls talking about trump administration harassing me and getting in my nerves this is just a terrible app 😤😡🤬

attributes.title: Horrible
attributes.review: This app is not good at all, there’s lots of bugs, it took forever to download, it crashes whenever I open it and it’s impossible to use. Fix it!

attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS APP
attributes.review: I was truly just here to support my great American president as one of the many gen z lovers of trump, but as soon as the app opened my whole phone crashed and aliens came down to earth and took my dog. So if you love your dog, don’t download this app....

attributes.title: NO GOOD):
attributes.review: When I downloaded the app it was just videos of trump saying peepee poopoo very loudly. It woke up my pap pap and he didn’t even have his hearing aid in/: so I will be deleting. I don’t think that is very professional of our president to act like that.

attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD
attributes.review: It’s hacked my phone!! I keep having strange pictures of an old orange man pop up. I’m terrified. I’m gonna have to throw my phone & my WiFi box &basically all of my technology away! It’s even infected my Nintendo switch!!!

attributes.title: NEVER AGAIN!
attributes.review: This app gave me severe diarrhea...and when I mean severe I mean IT WAS BAD! DONT DOWNLOAD THIS! The app is soo slow and it wanted to send me notifications? No thank you🤚 then this man who resembled a shriveled up ken doll popped up and it made my eyes bleed! This is not okay! I will be contacting the manufacturer!

attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD IT GAVE ME A VIRUS
attributes.review: After this app downloaded my phone started acting up. I kept getting glitches and weird notifications.... my phone even shut down idk what trump wants with my phone but stay away

attributes.title: AWFUL AWFUL AWFUL app
attributes.review: i hate this app!! it took 186 weeks to download and as soon as i opened it said slurs abt my race and sexuality and then told me to vote for trumpet tf i hate it!! i would give 0 stars if i could. gt it down as soon as possible!!
